titleStmt.title: A looking-glasse for Levellers: held out in a sermon, preached at St. Peters Pauls-Wharfe, upon Sunday in the after-noone, Sept. 24. 1648. / By Paul Knell, Master in Arts, of Clare-Hall in Cambridge. Sometime chaplain to a regiment of curasiers in His Majesties Army.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
